comments:
build I20050118 + latest from HEAD

Got the following NPE in the log, after there was a problem creating a workbench part.  Sorry, it was last week and I don't remember the full details.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.presentations.PresentablePart.setFocus(PresentablePart.java:148)
at org.eclipse.ui.internal.presentations.util.TabbedStackPresentation$1.handleEvent(TabbedStackPresentation.java:92)

at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:920)

Is this still a problem in 3.3?

PW
Hard to say, since I couldn't reproduce it.  But should probably check the code to see if a check for a null part is needed.
This looks like a race condition when a view stack disappears.

It's worth investigating some more (at least to match up attachListeners(*) with a detachListeners(*), which is never called).

PW
I'm not sure it's a race condition.  If there was a problem creating the workbench part, the part field will always be null.
